de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.database.ids

Interface DBIDVar

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ArrayDBIDs, DBIDRef, DBIDs, SetDBIDs
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    IntegerDBIDVar

    public interface DBIDVar
extends DBIDRef, ArrayDBIDs, SetDBIDs
    (Persistent) variable storing a DBID reference. In contrast to the DBIDRef API, which are read-only references, this variable can be updated to point to a different DBID, e.g. the current best candidate.
    Author:
    Erich Schubert

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods
